title: Typefaces for a book
content: doing a short book about the american 60s rock/folk revolution. need a headline and text pair. any suggestions on type for this subject?
author: clearbolt

comments.content:
I'd check out Jim Parkinson's work:   
 [http://typedesign.com/fontlist01.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20131031234659/http:/typedesign.com/fontlist01.html)   
Maybe it's just the Rolling Stone connection... but his stuff seems to say Rock 'n' Roll to me.
